title: Commission Decision of 4 July 1991 amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 4 July 1991  amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts  (Only the English text is authentic)   (91/379/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The humanitarian organization 'Feed the Children' is added to the Annex to Decision 86/77/EEC, with effect from 17 June 1991.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 6. (2) OJ No L 201, 31. 7. 1990, p. 9. (3) OJ No L 310, 21. 11. 1985, p. 9. (4) OJ No L 151, 15. 6. 1990, p. 29. (5) OJ No L 76, 21. 3. 1986, p. 54. (6) OJ No L 100, 20. 4. 1991, p. 41.
